licence_overview:
$!Contact your council to find out if you need a licence to put an advertising sign or display on the road or pavement in England or Wales.$!

##Restrictions
You must obey any conditions the council puts in your licence.

##How to apply
Contact the council to apply for a pavement or street display licence.

^You might have to pay a fee for a licence.^

##Fines and penalties
If you don't obey the conditions on your licence, it can be withdrawn and you can be fined up to £2,500.

%If you put an advertising sign or display on a pavement or road without a licence, you can be fined up to £2,500, and £250 for each day that its stays there.%
licence_short_description: A licence for putting advertising signs on the road or pavement.
